1. Mayor & City Council

Mayor & City Council
====================

Learn how Snyder’s elected officials represent and serve our community. The Mayor and City Council make important decisions that guide city policy, budget, services, and development.

Use the
[City Council District Map](https://www.snydertx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/5690/Voting-Districts?bidId=)
to find your district and learn which council member represents you.

The City Council meets on the first Monday of every month at 5:30 pm in the City Hall Council Chambers. If a holiday falls on that date, the meeting will take place on the second Monday of the month at 5:30 pm.

Note: District Two is currently vacant.

### [Contact Us](https://www.snydertx.gov/Directory.aspx)

1. ![Stephanie Ducheneaux ](https://www.snydertx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=7615 "Stephanie Ducheneaux ")

   #### Stephanie Ducheneaux

   Mayor

   [Email Mayor Stephanie Ducheneaux](mailto:mayorducheneaux@gmail.com)

   Two-year term expiring in 2027.

   #### Ralph Hernandez

   Council Member - District One

   [Email Ralph Hernandez](mailto:rhernandez@snydertx.gov)

   Two-year term expiring in 2026.

   Council Member - District Three

   Two-year term expiring in 2026.

   Council Member - District Four

   Two-year term expiring in 2026.
